definitions.definition: A Bachelor of Arts appointed to make satirical strictures in humorous dispute with the candidates at a degree-awarding ceremony; tripos , prevaricator .
labels: in the history of Cambridge University
capitalised when used as a title
definitions.label_groups: obsolete , rare , in the history of Cambridge University , capitalised when used as a title

definitions.definition: A vessel (usually a pot or cauldron ) resting on three legs, often given as an ornament , a prize , or as an offering at a shrine to a god or oracle ; often specifically, that such vessel upon which the priestess sat to deliver her oracles at the shrine to Apollo at Delphi ; tripod .
The hindmost Weberian ossicle of the Weberian apparatus , touching the anterior wall of the swimbladder and connected by a dense, elongate ligament to the intercalarium .

main_definition: ( obsolete , rare , in the history of Cambridge University , capitalised when used as a title ) A Bachelor of Arts appointed to make satirical strictures in humorous dispute with the candidates at a degree-awarding ceremony; tripos , prevaricator .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , rare ) A vessel (usually a pot or cauldron ) resting on three legs, often given as an ornament , a prize , or as an offering at a shrine to a god or oracle ; often specifically, that such vessel upon which the priestess sat to deliver her oracles at the shrine to Apollo at Delphi ; tripod .

( zoology , in cypriniform fishes ) The hindmost Weberian ossicle of the Weberian apparatus , touching the anterior wall of the swimbladder and connected by a dense, elongate ligament to the intercalarium .
